title: Troubleshoot Bluetooth Pairing Issue
description: A customer is unable to pair their new smartphone with the car's infotainment system.

tasks.description: Identify the vehicle model and the customer's smartphone model.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a 2022 Mach-E and an iPhone 15.

tasks.description: Guide the customer to delete the old phone profile from the car and the old car profile from the phone.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear step-by-step instructions for deleting previous connections.

tasks.description: Walk the customer through the pairing process again, ensuring the car is in discovery mode.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer successfully pairs their phone with the car.
